tags: mamma mia! here we go again
summary:
Sometimes when I'm lonely I sit and think about him
And it hurts to remember all the good times
When I thought I could never...
body:
Sometimes when I’m lonely I sit and think about him

And it hurts to remember all the good times

When I thought I could never live without him

And I wonder does it have to be the same

Every time if I see him, will it bring back all the pain?

Ah-ha-ha, how can I forget that name?🎤🎶😢

Ahsoka about anakin:

tags: I love my angry lesbian cat daughter
summary: Wow, that totally random anon must be so dumb! Even I can tell they meant rogue three and catradora, in this order. Who could be...
question: Wow, that totally random anon must be so dumb! Even I can tell they meant rogue three and catradora, in this order. Who could be dumb enough to forget to specify?? A true mystery
answer:
Of course, dahling, of course

27. Name the biggest change you would make to Rogue Three

Oh boy

OH BOY

Give me R3 alive and kicking in the new trilogy

Give me a greying General Bodhi Rook still leading Rogue Squad into battle, being exasperated but endeared at Poe Dameron’s antics, taking Finn under his wing and telling him how terrified he was when he defected the Empire but how knowing he made the right choice made him go on, ensuring Rey that no one is too small, no one is too insignificant in the grand scheme of things and even the smallest act of bravery from the seeminlgy most unassuming person can change the galaxy

Give me Jyn Erso, no fancy titles or pretty insignias, but despite the age lines around them her eyes still with the same spark as two decades ago, bursting into control rooms and calling people out on their bullshit, fire and power and acid on the tip of her tongue, and a mutual deep trust and respect towards General Organa. 

Give me a spy who’s nothing but a ghost story in mission logs, a shadow that goes in sticky situations and solves the bullshit, known as nothing but Fulcrum in whispers along the halls of Resistance bases, who’s known as the last resort, something akin to a secret weapon, as deadly as the Starkiller, just in a smaller scale - but much more precise. And that is obviously very much NOT Cassian Andor, with his awkward smiles, his singsong accent and his utter devotion to his wife and husband.

30. Name the most awkward moment from Catradora

*slams fists on table* PRINCESS PROM! THE TRASHCAN SCENE!!!! GOD!!!!!!!!!!!

On another hand, I saw really few comedic scenes that were awkward and funny without killing me with second hand embarassment like that one did. Good Fucking Job, Noelle Stevenson <3

Ask me about my ships!

reblog.comment:
Of course, dahling, of course

summary: If these are triggers for you, do not read.
body:
Clone Colony AU

Since I’ve been talking about rewriting it so much, my original Clone Colony AU can be found here:

Clone Colony AU - SilenceOfTheBlackRoseDragons - Star Wars: The Clone Wars (2008) - All Media Types [Archive of Our Own]

If you guys want to read it, be warned, it is cloncest, sexual content between consenting adults, some BDSM themes, violence, and lastly contains male pregnancy.

If these are triggers for you, do not read.

summary: Our Path Between The Stars- Epiloge
title: Our Path Between The Stars- Epiloge
body:
And here is the last part of my little story.

Read also Prolouge, Chapter 1, Chapter 2, Chapter 3

———————————————————————-

There may be a thin line between victory and defeat, between this and much more, between what we see and what not. There appears to be a thin line between loss and joy, happiness and grieving, bliss and despair. Like a thread binding life together, making out of each piece, as different as it may seem, a whole. It simply has to be like that. Because otherwise, nothing would matter.


Leia is sure, would someone try to describe her life so far, there would be more then enough room for tears, until in the end you have none left to share. One from the outside couldn’t feel differently, couldn’t understand differently what life has given to her. The glimmer of childhood days in a palace is nothing more then an image already blurred.


Yet, tiered as she may be, eyes heavy and eager for rest, despair is far from her mind. Right now she’s lying in a bunk familiar to her, the pillow uncomfortable and dear, the sound of engines quietly uniting in a symphony well known. For a moment it’s possible to imagine a beloved voice to be heard asking her to make some room in that rather modest bed. For a moment she smiles. Her hands clutch around something that is not longer there, her fingers move like they are holding something. It is nearly as if she can feel Han’s arms around her. There is even an echo of child laughter somewhere.


A laughter that got clouded by a shadow, a laughter that hides under a mantle of darkness. One could look back trying to find the exact moment when things turned wrong, so wrong, but truth is there was never one moment. Her memories consist of a wide spectrum of images, her mind remembers days and days, her heart swells with emotion, yearning between all that had happened only for the sound of her little boys laughter. A laughter she still hopes to hear again. Maybe if not here, but in what comes after.


She wakes up from her revere by the sound of someone coughing and remembers that they are heading towards uncertainty. An old spaceship filled with two dozens of survivors.


Taking a deep breath she closes her eyes. One would picture her feeling alone, lonely among all these people. She on the other hand needs only a moment to know better. Like a whisper she can hear her brothers words consoling her. Her fingers twist again, enclose something that is not there anymore. But it isn’t really gone either.

And in the darkness of space, all alone between the stars, a ship flies towards the unknown. On the outside it may not look like much, but inside it’s filled with hope.

A laughter she still hopes to hear again. Maybe if not here, but in what comes after.


She wakes up from her revere by the sound of someone coughing and remembers that they are heading towards uncertainty. An old spaceship filled with two dozens of survivors.


Taking a deep breath she closes her eyes. One would picture her feeling alone, lonely among all these people. She on the other hand needs only a moment to know better. Like a whisper she can hear her brothers words consoling her. Her fingers twist again, enclose something that is not there anymore. But it isn’t really gone either.

And in the darkness of space, all alone between the stars, a ship flies towards the unknown. On the outside it may not look like much, but inside it’s filled with hope.

blog.name: radioactivepeasant
blog.title: Nobody Panic!
blog.description:
Adventures in fandom and creative writing

Here, you'll find a lot of fandom-related posts...and a heck of a lot of writing. So much writing. I do writing prompts just about every weekday, Monday to Friday.

What you're not going to find are posts that insult others or put people down. There's enough of that in the real world: I don't need any on my blog, thanks.

tags: it would be a funny episode
summary: Fic Prompts: Star Wars Wednesday
body:
Fic Prompts: Star Wars Wednesday

“I’m not mad, guys,” Hera said. Under her breath she added, “Not yet, anyway,” then continued. “I just want to know who brought these things aboard.”

Sabine looked at Zeb. Zeb looked at Chopper. And Chopper made offended noises and waved an arm at Ezra.

“What?!” Ezra yelped, “That is 100% not true! Why would you even think it was me?”

“The tooka,” Zeb counted on one finger.

“The baby fyrnok that one time,” Sabine added.

“And let’s not forget Lothcat-mageddon,” Kanan interjected.

Everyone twitched a little, even Chopper. “Trust me dear,” Hera said with a smirk, “Nobody is going to forget Lothcat-mageddon.”

With a groan, Ezra drooped. “Okay okay, so maybe I can connect with nature a little more effectively than we thought. But I did not bring that aboard!”

The “that” in question was a round ball of fluffy fur, about the size of Zeb’s fist. It had no noticeable eyes, limbs, or mouth, but was making a contented trilling that was…a little more endearing than expected. It sat innocently on a bench in the cargo hold, seemingly unaware of the discussion going on around it.

“C'mon guys, one of you knows how it got in here,” Hera sighed. “I don’t think it walked in.”

Chopper had absolutely no intention of admitting that he’d accidentally brought the thing in when dragging an anti-grav sled up the loading ramp. It wasn’t like he’d done it on purpose this time or anything.

The crew left the cargo hold to pilot the ship out of the port. Nobody noticed the extra fluffball sitting beside their little stowaway.

blog.name: mandowords
blog.title: Miit'alor
blog.description: I am a descriptivist linguist for the Mando'a language. I show what it can do, not what it MUST do. This is a place for discussion about Mando'a, and Mandalorian society and culture. Feel free to use the head cannons from this blog (or reblogged from others) in your RP or writing. All words and descriptions are taken from the mandoa.org Mandalorian Dictionary. Want to support this blog? Buy me a Kofi? OR buy some Mando'a themed items? Visit our Discord? Blog icon by Rina

summary: Icy Steps
title: Icy Steps
body:
Summary: Requested!Qui-GonxReader. After an argument, you storm out only to fall down and Qui-Gon gets worried. Ends with fluff. Slight AU

Pairing: Qui-Gon Jinn x Reader

Word Count: 715

Warnings: Slight angst, Fluff

Author’s Note: This is a story from a prompt list that I reblogged from the blog of @verobird. I have like 4 more coming out at the time I am writing this! I love doing this, so please keep sending them in! These are so much fun, and I hope you all enjoy reading them as much as I love writing them. Once again, these are going to be more like short drabbles than a long one-shot!

Disclaimer: I do not own Star Wars or the characters. Also, I do not own this GIF, found on GIPHY

Doors being slammed, raised voices, and watery eyes were all the product of fighting. You hated fighting with your boyfriend, and you two rarely ever did. It was so stupid and silly, as were most of your fights. You were mad because you had seen him talking to this girl lately, and you finally confronted him. Qui-Gon had been offended that you would even think he was cheating on you. So the fighting had ensued.

“I am going for a walk, I’ll come back later.” You had yelled out to the shut bedroom door. What was the use in even letting him know? He was mad, you were upset. IT wasn’t as if he was going to come chasing after you.

In a huff, you grabbed your coat and stormed off. Maybe you would go visit Padme and vent to her or just grab some tea with Obi-Wan. You were walking quite fast down the stairs of the apartment, and you were too deep in thought to notice the small patch of ice on the next step. Before you knew it you had slipped, and always slid down the rest of the way. It all happened so quick, you didn’t even have time to process. You had yet to feel anything, as you had felt quite numb. Though you knew the pain was coming, and it would feel like you had just got hit with a ton of bricks.

“Qui-Gon!” You shouted out, hoping he would be able to hear you. You highly doubt that, but now your back was beginning to throb and your hands were bleeding from the rough stone steps.

“Y/N?” Qui-Gon’s voice was a sweet relief and managed to sit up a bit as you heard him coming down the stairs. “Oh my, are you okay? What happened?” His voice was rushed and panicked, and you were trying to soothe him.

“I’m fine, my back hurts, and I roughed my hands up a bit. But overall, I am good. I need help getting up.” Before you can finish the words, Qui-Gon had completely picked you up and began walking back up the stairs.

“I am so sorry, Y/N. I shouldn’t have let you leave. As soon as we get inside I will make you a hot bath, and some hot cocoa.” He told you, kissing your forehead gingerly.

He carried you the whole entire way up to the apartment and made sure your bath was perfect. As you relaxed in the tub he made your hot cocoa, you were truly in love with this man.

“Y/N, can we talk?” His voice stirs you from your relaxation, and you thank him as he puts your mug on the side of the tub. You nod your head, waiting for him to continue. “Listen, I hate fighting with you. And this is so stupid. I was so worried, and if I would have just been open and honest, you wouldn’t have gotten hurt. I have been seeing that lady a lot, but it isn’t for what you think. She is a really good jeweler, and I wanted something this special to be super unique. So I have been trying to secretly meet with her, and give her as much information about you as possible. When you caught us yesterday, she was finally giving me the final product.” The young man said, pulling out what you thought to be the most gorgeous ring ever. “I love you more than I thought possible. I want to spend every single second of every day with you. This wasn’t exactly my ideal proposal, but after all of this, I wanted you to know.”

To say you were surprised as the understatement of the year. You felt like an ass, but at the same time, you were so amazed and in loved your eyes began to water. “Yes! I’ll marry you!” You exclaimed, holding your arms out to give him a hug.

An ecstatic Qui-Gon bends down to hug you, but you pull him into the tub, water splashing and your hot cocoa mug hitting the floor. You didn’t care, the two of you were just so happy. “I need to fall down stairs more often.” You joked, both of you laughing as he slides the ring onto your finger.

I want to spend every single second of every day with you. This wasn’t exactly my ideal proposal, but after all of this, I wanted you to know.”

To say you were surprised as the understatement of the year. You felt like an ass, but at the same time, you were so amazed and in loved your eyes began to water. “Yes! I’ll marry you!” You exclaimed, holding your arms out to give him a hug.

An ecstatic Qui-Gon bends down to hug you, but you pull him into the tub, water splashing and your hot cocoa mug hitting the floor. You didn’t care, the two of you were just so happy. “I need to fall down stairs more often.” You joked, both of you laughing as he slides the ring onto your finger.
trail.content_abstract:
Summary: Requested!Qui-GonxReader. After an argument, you storm out only to fall down and Qui-Gon gets worried. Ends with fluff. Slight AU

Pairing: Qui-Gon Jinn x Reader

Word Count: 715

Warnings: Slight angst, Fluff

Author’s Note: This is a story from a prompt list that I reblogged from the blog of @verobird. I have like 4 more coming out at the time I am writing this! I love doing this, so please keep sending them in! These are so much fun, and I hope you all enjoy reading them as much as I love writing them. Once again, these are going to be more like short drabbles than a long one-shot!

Disclaimer: I do not own Star Wars or the characters. Also, I do not own this GIF, found on GIPHY
